#!/bin/bash /usr/local/mysql/bin/mysql -uroot -proot -Dtest -e " drop table order_detail;"
/usr/local/mysql/bin/mysql -uroot -proot -Dtest -e " create table order_detail as select a.ds,a.orderid,username,status,goods_name from t_order a join t_item b on a.ds = b.ds and a.orderid = b.orderid;"
